title: Patch update stuck
body:
I reinstalled the game on my Mac because I was having problems updating the new patch. 
The first installation got stuck on 87% and didn't move. The client helper says that the estimated time is 25 minutes but it's been hours. 

I have uninstalled and reinstalled the game 3 times and reached 87% all three times, but nothing happens after that. 
Help a brotha out.

replies.body: It sounds like your connection might be running poorly, so your patcher is trying to go back and fill in missing holes to update but failing.  Go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix that up.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your issue!  Let me know if you have any questions.
